page.title: 05The Church Part 3
page.content: There is a Sunday school during church service at eleven_thirty. There are three classes.{Mrs. Murray}teaches the seniors,{Mrs. Baird}the intermediates and{Miss Stewart}the beginners. A{ {nativity}play is performed every year at Christmas. The Bible class taught by{Mrs. Stewart}meets before Sunday School. There are about ten members. The church is managed by the{Minister and the{Church Session}which is composed of fourteen{Elders. Of these, four are{lady elders.}The{ {Session Clerk,}or secretary, is one of the lady elders,{a sign of the {changing times.}The church{Woman's {Guild}meets once a month. They elect members to various church committees and raise money for the various church activities. The Guild{Coffee Morning} is one of the highlights of the social calendar.
